name: Out Cold
description:
You need to get the lights up for Christmas, but they keep going out! Keep all the lights connected while weathering a storm of snowballs from the neighborhood kids -- shoot for a high score. Let all the lights go out, and it's game over!
Share your high score in the comments!

Controls:
WASD/Arrow keys: move/climb/bump ladder

E: Interact (fill up on lights from box, repair lights)

Space: Grab and hold to move the ladder


Credits:

Made for the Cozy Winter Jam 2022.

Original art by @MrMaker7
Software by @Mikehoyle & @Khelandros
